com.sjfc.fisherapp
Class DirectoryDetailsActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.sjfc.fisherapp.DirectoryActivity
          com.sjfc.fisherapp.DirectoryDetailsActivity

public class DirectoryDetailsActivity
extends DirectoryActivity

Displays details for one Faculty or Staff member as chosen in DirectoryListActivity. Shows full name, job title, department, faculty/staff status, office location, office phone number, and Fisher email address, with some extra options and functionality.

onCreateOptionsMenu

public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
Initializes the Options Menu that comes up when the user presses the Menu button on their device. Options are Call Phone, Send Email, Share, and Add to Contacts.

onOptionsItemSelected

Implements the actual functionality of the Options Menu items when they are clicked.
